metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44469 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Server-Side Request Forgery issue in the OpenID Connect Issuer in LemonLDAP::NG before 2.17.1 allows authenticated remote attackers to send GET requests to arbitrary URLs through the request_uri authorization parameter. This is similar to CVE-2020-10770.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
